text: Jean-Marc Ayrault (born 25 January 1950) is a French politician. He was the Prime Minister of France from 15 May 2012 to 31 March 2014. He was the Mayor of Nantes from 1989 to 2012. He was appointed prime minister by Fran√ßois Hollande following the defeat of the UMP president and the resignation of that government. == References == Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:French mayors Category:Prime ministers of France Category:French Roman Catholics Category:Government ministers of France Category:Politicians from Pays de la Loire Category:People from Maine-et-Loire Category:Socialist Party (France) politicians
title: Jean-Marc Ayrault
